text:
makShiqkA&&Saq yadvAq svarauq svadhi#tau riqptamasti# | 
yaddhasta#yOH SamiqturyannaqKEShuq sarvAq tA tEq api# dEqvEShva#stu || 
yadUva#ddhyamuqdara#syApaqvAtiq ya Aqmasya# kraqviShO# gaqndhO asti# | 
suqkRuqtA tacCa#miqtAra#H kRuNvantUqta mEdha(gm)# SRutaqpAka#M pacantu || 
yat tEq gAtrA#daqgninA# paqcyamA#nAdaqBi SUlaqM niha#tasyAvaqdhAva#ti | 
mA tad-BUmyAqmA Sri#Shaq ( )-nmA tRuNE#Shu dEqvEByaqstaduqSadByO# 
rAqtama#stu || 42 
(i - duqtO - kraqviSha#H - SriShath - saqpta ca#) (A8)
